mapper.select: SELECT id, emp_name, com.comName_ryak, dep_name, pos_name, gender, mail, address, entry_date FROM t_employee emp JOIN t_department dep ON emp.dep_code = dep.dep_code JOIN t_company com ON com.com_code = emp.com_code join t_position pos ON pos.pos_code = emp.pos_code WHERE id = #{id};
